name: Cupid Date
description:
A short visual novel about three and a half "love stories" starring a gay alien boy named Kale, whose matchmaking roommate Sugar is determined to help him find true love. But when Sugar's a cupid with his own agenda and all Kale's potential soulmates are under a spell, can love really be all that true?

(There are four endings and it takes less than an hour over four play-throughs if you want see them all. To make sure you're on the right track with them, or to read about the optional content warnings for everything going on with Cupid Date, click this fully spoiler-y link!)

With thanks to:
Adryn, for character designs and character sprites!
GlassHeart, for background art and setting design!
WinterMochie, for logo and user interface design!
Green Bear Music for the soundtrack!
SprigganArt, for the title screen art!
You, for just stopping by!
